name: Battletoads / Double Dragon: On Ragnarok
overview:
Hack that adds the “Lee” brothers and new bosses to the original Battletoads.

Strap on your Knee Pads, power up the Toadster, an' get on down to the Dark Queen's planet - but, watch out 'toad - 'cuz this lady's bad, an' she's got a whole load of really nasty surprises lined up just for you - like the Psyko Pigs, the Mutant Rat Pack, Retro Blasters and the Saturn Toadtrap, to name a few. You're gonna need all your fighting skills to defeat her - and the Double Dragons are on your side ready to fight it out!
